text: 2.9 Lom 2.17, 2 Ko 11.14-15, 1 Ti 6.18, Jem 2.5, Lep 3.9 Yad nepin, binɨb yokɨp ogɨnap nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gel, nɨbi binɨb yɨmgeptek mɨdebɨm ak pen, yad nɨgen bin gɨn bɨ gɨn yɨbɨl mɨdebɨm agak. Pen Juda ogɨnap, chɨn Juda yɨpɨd gɨl mɨdobun apal ak pen, Satan binɨb ne mɨdɨl nɨbop takaw dɨlɨg mɨdebal ak, yad abe nepin agak.
